question: 縮まる
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>shrink</kanji> so the verb vocab version means <vocabulary>to shrink</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Jesus couldn't cause the monster <vocabulary>to shrink</vocabulary>. He had to transform into <reading>cheese jesus</reading> (<ja>ちぢ</ja>), a more powerful version of himself, in order to shrink the monster down to size.
